verses.text: \w My|strong="H3117"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* wasted, \w my|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* shortened, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* only \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w grave|strong="H6913"\w* remaineth \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H6913"\w*.
\w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* sinned, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H0518"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* abideth \w in|strong="H3808"\w* bitterness.

Deliver \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w O|strong="H4994"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w beside|strong="H3027"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* any manâ€™s \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* fight \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*.

Thou hast \w set|strong="H7311"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1121"\w* promiseth \w a|strong="H7453"\w* prey \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5046"\w* companions, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5046"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w fail|strong="H3615"\w*.

\w He|strong="H6440"\w* hath \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w byword|strong="H4914"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H1961"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* example \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* dim \w through|strong="H3605"\w* indignation, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* limbs \w are|strong="H5869"\w* brought as \w it|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H5869"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w just|strong="H3477"\w* \w shall|strong="H3477"\w* be \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w and|strong="H8074"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w shall|strong="H3477"\w* be raised \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hypocrite.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w man|strong="H6662"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H3027"\w* hath \w clean|strong="H2891"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w stronger|strong="H0555"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w stronger|strong="H0555"\w*.

Wherefore \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w converted|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w among|strong="H4672"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H5423"\w*, \w my|strong="H3117"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H3824"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* dissipated, tormenting \w my|strong="H3117"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w turned|strong="H7760"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w into|strong="H3915"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* hope \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w again|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* hell \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H0518"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* made \w my|strong="H0518"\w* \w bed|strong="H3326"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*.

If \w I|strong="H0001"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* said \w to|strong="H0001"\w* rottenness: Thou art \w my|strong="H7121"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*; \w to|strong="H0001"\w* \w worms|strong="H7415"\w*, \w my|strong="H7121"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w my|strong="H7121"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*.

\w Where|strong="H0346"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w now|strong="H0645"\w* \w then|strong="H0645"\w* \w my|strong="H7789"\w* expectation, and \w who|strong="H4310"\w* considereth \w my|strong="H7789"\w* patience?

\w All|strong="H3162"\w* \w that|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H0905"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* deepest pit: thinkest thou \w that|strong="H0518"\w* there \w at|strong="H5921"\w* least \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H0905"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* rest?
